searchDocs.title: ğŸ“¥ Installationâ€‹
searchDocs.content: All modules are installable via Wally.

searchDocs.title: âš™ï¸ Wally Setupâ€‹
searchDocs.content: First, ensure Wally is installed. Then follow these steps:  Initialize Wally in your project: wally init Add the package you would like to install to your wally.toml file:  Example:  [dependencies] connections = "unknown91248/connections@0.0.2"   Install dependencies by running wally install in your project's terminal Wally will then create a /Packages folder which is where you will be requiring your scripts from.

searchDocs.title: ğŸš€ Usage Example (Connections module)â€‹
searchDocs.content: local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage") local Connections = require(ReplicatedStorage.Packages.connections) -- Create a new named connection local conn = Connections.NewConnection("TouchEvent", workspace.Part.Touched, function(hit) print("Touched by:", hit.Name) end) -- Start listening to the event conn:Connect() task.wait(5) -- Cleanup when done conn:Disconnect() conn:Destroy()
